ul.li: Neutron quota failed to update if we include security group or security group rule parameters : Issue an error msg "Must specify new values to update quota", if no arguments are provided while executing neutron quota-update.
MySql Failure : Cleaned up mysql db connection string, removed deprecated verbose log config, and corrected the order of tasks in reconfigure replay.

section.title: Encrypted 3Par Volume
section.p: Attaching an encrypted 3Par volume is possible after installation by setting volume_use_multipath = true under the libvirt section in the nova/kvm-hypervisor.conf.j2 file. For more information and configuration steps, see:
